endpoints.description: Retrieve a list of available diagnostic test results with their corresponding statuses.
Send a notification to a healthcare professional or patient regarding an available test result.
Fetch the detailed information of a specific diagnostic test result by its unique identifier.
Update the status of the specific test result to indicate acknowledgment.
Retrieve a list of healthcare providers within the system.
Access the history of notifications sent within a specified timeframe.
Resend a previously issued notification to its intended recipient.
List all test results associated with a specific patient.
Submit new diagnostic test results into the system for processing and notification.
Remove a notification from the notification history by its identifier.
